roleset.name: to scamper
roleset.note: SCURRY-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from scurry.01-v)

example.name: with direction
example.text: Some scenes : -- Saturday morning , [a resident]-1 was given [*-1]15 minutes [*]-1 to scurry into a sagging building and reclaim what she could [*T*-2] of her life 's possessions .
